#summary How to get involved

There are many ways to get involved with the PPCdroid project.

== Become a PPCDroid user ==
  * Try out Rowboat Android - either pre-built or from [Source source]
  * Give us feedback via IRC [http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ppcdroid #ppcdroid] or the PPCDroid mailing list (ppcdroid@googlegroups.com)
  * If you find an issue or bug, file a project [http://code.google.com/p/ppcdroid/issues/entry issue]

== Share your PPCDroid knowledge ==
  * Add [http://code.google.com/p/ppcdroid/wiki/ Wiki] articles or edit existing topics
  * Share your knowledge on [http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ppcdroid #ppcdroid] or [mailto:ppcdroid@googlegroups.com ppcdroid@googlegroups.com] 

== Submit code ==
  * Send your patches to the mailing list, [mailto:ppcdroid@googlegroups.com ppcdroid@googlegroups.com]
